column2: gwriter, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: has controlled the pain with spasms

column2: Mary Thompson, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: When I first took the medication it instantly upset my stomache but after I ate the irritation went away. Its been working fine so far but the only bad side effect I have is that it turns my urine blue. Why is this?

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Have painful spasms due to stent - this drug did nothing to relieve that pain - paid almost $400 for 120 pills - very expensive for not working

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: VERY expensive medication gave me no relief from pain caused by stent

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I first used this medication to help me get through a bad UTI.  Then, after having a birth control implant removed and switching back to the pill, my bladder would spasm when I started my period.  Since I was having spasms only a couple of days a month, a long term treatment didn't make as much since for me.  UTA gives me the temporary relief I need quickly and without the irritating side effects of a long term bladder control treatment.

column2: 75 or over Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
grandmother, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This capsule has helped my painful urination.

column2: footsie, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have IC and was given this drug, I also have back problems with lots of pain, but when I take this medicine my back does not hurt.  Could I have a bladder infection.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: The green urine is somewhat disturbing, but the relief is definately worth it.

column2: Kim, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Until today I would have rated it 5 stars.  I have a 24hrs cardiac monitor due to palpitations.  It makes no sense since I have no adverse symptoms, I'm healthy and only 39. Then I looked up the possible side effects of UTA and irregular heart beat is listed.  Thinking back I remember more palpitations while I was clearing up a stubborn bladder infection and taking Uta prn. Woe is me though! I can't take Pyridium d/t headaches.
